verses.text: Now when \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w praying|strong="H6419"\w*, the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*; and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, because the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And when all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* how the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, they \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w* themselves with their \w faces|strong="H0639"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* upon the \w pavement|strong="H7531"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*, and \w praised|strong="H3034"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add saying\add*, For \add he is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*: so the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w dedicated|strong="H2596"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w waited|strong="H5975"\w* on their \w offices|strong="H4931"\w*: the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* also with \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w musick|strong="H7892"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* to \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, because his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* by their \w ministry|strong="H3027"\w*; and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* sounded \w trumpets|strong="H2690"\w* before them, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*.  +  r 7.6  t by their…: Heb. by their hand *

Moreover \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w* the \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* that \add was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for there he \w offered|strong="H6213"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, because the \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* which \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* was not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w receive|strong="H3557"\w* the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and the meat \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*.

¶ Also at the same \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*, from the entering \w in|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w* unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And in the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a solemn \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w*: for they \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* the \w dedication|strong="H2598"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft a solemn…: Heb. a restraint\f*

And on the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* into their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, \w glad|strong="H8056"\w* and \w merry|strong="H2896"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* for the \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Thus \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and all that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and in his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, he prosperously \w effected|strong="H6743"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, and have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* to myself for an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2005"\w* I shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* that there be no \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, or if I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w locusts|strong="H2284"\w* to \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, or if I \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* among my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*;

If my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which are \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, shall \w humble|strong="H3665"\w* themselves, and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w*, and \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from their \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*; then will I \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and will \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, and will \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 7.14 \ft which…: Heb. upon whom my name is called\f*

Now mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall be \w open|strong="H6605"\w*, and mine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w attent|strong="H7183"\w* unto the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \add that is made\add* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.\f + \fr 7.15 \ft unto…: Heb. to the prayer of this place\f*

For now have I \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* may be there \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: and mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* and mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall be there \w perpetually|strong="H3117"\w*.

And as for thee, if thou wilt \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, as \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, and shalt \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*;

Then will I \w stablish|strong="H6965"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of thy \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, according as I have \w covenanted|strong="H3772"\w* with \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, There shall not \w fail|strong="H3772"\w* thee a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add to be\add* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 7.18 \ft There…: Heb. There shall not be cut off to thee\f*

But if ye turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* and my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, which I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, and shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* them;

Then will I pluck them up by the \w roots|strong="H5428"\w* out of my \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them; and this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which I have \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* for my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, will I cast \w out|strong="H7993"\w* of my \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, and will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* it \add to be\add* a \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* and a \w byword|strong="H8148"\w* among all \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.

And this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which is \w high|strong="H5945"\w*, shall be an \w astonishment|strong="H8074"\w* to every one that \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w* by it; so that he shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Why hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* thus unto this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and unto this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?

And it shall be \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Because they \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, which brought them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and laid \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* on \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* them, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* them: therefore hath he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* all this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon them.
